footer.description: Welcome to Angularify! I'm Mikolaj Cieslinski, a seasoned front-end developer specializing in Angular with over 7 years of hands-on experience. Here, I share insights, tips, and the latest trends in Angular development. Join me on this journey as we explore the world of front-end coding together!
